name: Bayt.com
overview:
Bayt.com is the #1 job site in the Middle East, offering a complete range of end-to-end employment solutions and career planning tools. Bayt.com is fully functional in English, Arabic and French, and offers the fastest, easiest, most effective and cost-efficient methods for employers to find quality candidates, and for job seekers to find top jobs, in the Middle East and North Africa.

Founded in 2000, Bayt.com is firmly committed to the region and understands the Middle East recruitment market in an unparalleled manner. This is evidenced by its fully trilingual recruitment platform, which is the first and only such platform in the region, its full range of online recruitment services, as well as its 11 regional offices in Abu Dhabi, Al Kuwait, Amman, Beirut, Casablanca, Doha, Dubai, Eastern Province, Jeddah, Manama, Riyadh. With over 4,250,000 professionals and over 30,000 leading organizations using Bayt.com’s recruitment services across all industry categories and career levels, Bayt.com is today the single largest online marketplace of professionals and employers in the region.
